snippet: Two competing concerts at Caramoor and Copland House March 11 will both explore perspectives on America that are framed, implicitly or explicitly, by views of Europe.
abstract: Caramoor and Copland House in Westchester County will present musical events in March that are framed, implicitly or explicitly, by views of Europe; Copland House in Mount Kisco will host An American Journey, featuring sonata for piano and cello by Dan Visconti that is influenced by his studies in Berlin; Caramoor in Katonah will host New York to Paris, Paris to Paradise, kaleidoscopic look at the two culture capitals (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Two competing concerts at Caramoor and Copland House March 11 will both explore perspectives on America that are framed, implicitly or explicitly, by views of Europe.

headline.seo: American Music at Caramoor and Copland House

keywords.value: Caramoor Center for Music and the Arts
